lore: Centaurs are very territorial and go to great lengths to protect their home, a city built on top of a mountain which can only be accessed through a cave behind a waterfall.\n\nCentaur Chasers constantly watch the surroundings and chase away whoever gets closer than they should to the entrance.
menagerieDialog: Let's go on a raid! I want to see a village burn down before nightfall!
We should adopt a more tactical strategy. Blindly rushing into battle is a sure way to lead to failure.
Let us leave here and conquer new lands together!
I am under a great deal of stress. A few battles should help me relax.
name: Centaur Chaser
